name: The Shelled Life of Nagomi Mcdaniel
name_original: The Shelled Life of Nagomi Mcdaniel
description:
The Shelled Life of Nagomi Mcdaniel is an interactive horror game about the three years Blaseball star Nagomi Mcdaniel spent trapped inside of a peanut shell. 

This game is intense. Please take care of yourself when playing. Content warnings are on page 1. 

Cover image by @_waalkr.
